biotools.summary: First integrative genome browser to leverage Hi-C results for the interpretation of GWAS variants. It is able to display Hi-C data and statistical evidence for chromatin interactions in genomic regions surrounding any given GWAS variant, enabling straightforward visualization and interpretation.

bioschemas.name: HiView
